alert.note: Alert for Boone; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:41AM CDT until June 15 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greene County in west central Iowa... Eastern Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Boone County in central Iowa... Dallas County in central Iowa... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 139 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jefferson to near Stuart, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 134 AM, Guthrie County emergency management reported 65 mph wind near the intersection of 310th street and Highway 25. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Urbandale, Waukee, Boone, Grimes, Perry, Jefferson, Adel, Guthrie Center, Madrid, Ogden, Stuart, Dallas Center, Granger, Panora, Woodward, Lake Panorama, Boone Speedway, Redfield, Grand Junction and Dexter. This includes Interstate 80 near mile marker 100. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
